00024 
00025 #ifndef _BASE_SERIALIZABLE_
00026 #define _BASE_SERIALIZABLE_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/Object>
00030 
00031 #include <map>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace base {
00035 
00036 class Serializer;
00037 
00038 class Serializable : public virtual base::Object
00039 {
00040 public:
00041 
00042   virtual void serialize(Serializer& s) = 0; ///< read or write object state to Serializer
00043 
00044   // the following types and methods allow serialization of concrete derived class
00045   //  objects via a ref<> to their, possibly abstract, base class type
00046 
00047   class SerializableInstantiator {
00048   public:
00049     virtual Serializable* newSerializable() const = 0;
00050   };
00051 
00052   template<class SerializableDerived>
00053   class SerializableDerivedInstantiator : public SerializableInstantiator
00054   {
00055   public:
00056     virtual Serializable* newSerializable() const { 
00057       return NewObj SerializableDerived();
00058     }
00059   };
00060 
00061   template<class BaseClass, class DerivedClass>
00062   static void registerSerializableInstantiator(const SerializableInstantiator& instantiator)
00063   {
00064     registerSerializableInstantiator(base::className(typeid(BaseClass)), 
00065                                      base::className(typeid(DerivedClass)),
00066                                      instantiator);
00067   }
00068   
00069 
00070   template<class BaseClass>
00071   static const SerializableInstantiator& getSerializableInstantiator(const String& derivedClassTypeName)
00072   {
00073     return getSerializableInstantiator(base::className(typeid(BaseClass)),
00074                                        derivedClassTypeName); 
00075   }
00076 
00077 
00078   static void registerSerializableInstantiator(const String& baseClassTypeName, 
00079                                                const String& derivedClassTypeName,
00080                                                const SerializableInstantiator& instantiator);
00081 
00082   static const SerializableInstantiator& getSerializableInstantiator(const String& baseClassTypeName,
00083                                                                      const String& derivedClassTypeName);
00084 
00085 private:
00086   typedef std::pair<String, const SerializableInstantiator*> BaseAndInstantiatorPair;
00087   typedef std::map<String, BaseAndInstantiatorPair > DerivedClassMap;
00088   static DerivedClassMap derivedClasses;
00089 };
00090 
00091 } // base
00092 
00093 #endif
